Newcomers in Timișoara can access various types of support including official immigration contacts, assistance with accommodation, meals, medical services, psychological support, free public transportation, and educational opportunities. Several organizations also provide social and legal counseling, job assistance, and language courses.

Look for the relevant headings that match your needs.

The Union of Ukrainians in Romania aims to protect the rights and promote the ethnic, linguistic, cultural, and religious identity of persons belonging to the Ukrainian minority. It also seeks to revive national unity, protect members' individual and collective rights, and strengthen Romanian-Ukrainian collaboration.

To find this information on a webpage, you would look for a section titled "Organisations offering their support" or similar, and then locate the specific entry for "The Union of Ukrainians in Romania" within that section.
